summary: E-commerce website for KanhaRas Spices - an online spice selling platform
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- KanhaRas Spices brand logo with traditional spice motifs, warm earth tones (kanharas-logo.dim_400x400.png)
- Turmeric powder in rustic bowl, warm yellow tones (turmeric-powder.dim_800x800.png)
- Red chili powder in traditional container, vibrant red (chili-powder.dim_800x800.png)
- Cumin seeds in wooden spoon, brown earthy tones (cumin-seeds.dim_800x800.png)
- Coriander seeds in clay pot, green-brown tones (coriander-seeds.dim_800x800.png)
- Garam masala blend in ornate bowl, mixed brown tones (garam-masala.dim_800x800.png)
- Black pepper in rustic setting, dark black grains (black-pepper.dim_800x800.png)
- Hero banner image showing various colorful spices in traditional market setting (spices-hero.dim_1920x600.png)

existing_features.title: Create a product catalog page that displays all available spices with images, names, prices, and descriptions
Implement individual product detail pages that show complete information about each spice including full description, pricing, and availability
Build a shopping cart system that allows customers to add spices, adjust quantities, and view their cart total
Create a checkout flow that collects customer shipping information and displays order summary
Display the brand name 'KanhaRas Spices' prominently in the header/navigation across all pages
Design a warm, inviting visual theme that reflects traditional spice markets with earth tones, organic textures, and elegant typography that conveys quality and authenticity
Render generated spice product images and brand logo as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated

new_feature_requests.summary: Product catalog with all types of spices
